channel.title: Aslo .. thankes
channel.description:
! How can i do when somone kills a green dragon i says to all player "name has slayed the greendragon
2. How can i make a player count so when somone comes in it will say there name and say how many players online
3.how can i make items untraderble
4. aslo on other sever,s i have seen when you click on a player it comes up with diffent stuff like
attack.. rapee ..
and allthat how can i have that on my sever
5 last one
How can i make a littel boz in a cowner of the screen and it says how many players are online what sever your using .. and that
thankes you been a star !!

item.title: Aslo .. thankes
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

  1. I’ll have a look and edit this post when I find something
  2. Within class Client’s run method, where playerName is assigned the users playerName, under that put;
    server.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has just logged on, there are now " + server.playerHandler.playerCount() + " players online.";
    So, open up the file called “Client.java”, and hold the control key, and press F. Now type in "playerName = ". This will take you to where playerName is assigned.
    Under that line, put this;
server.playerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has just logged on, there are now " + server.playerHandler.playerCount() + " players online.";

  1. To make items untradable, xerocheez did this, so go into the file called “client.java”, class client, then look for “untradable[]” You should come to something like this;
    public int untradable[] = { }; // all untradable items here bitchez
    Add the item ID to that array.

  2. I don’t know sorry, I’m not near a server source.

Read full topic
